text: Francis J. Shakespeare (April 9, 1925 â€“ December 14, 2022) was an American politician and media executive. He was the president of CBS Television before entering public service. He was the United States Ambassador to Portugal from 1985 to 1986 and the United States Ambassador to the Holy See from 1986 to 1989. He died on December 14, 2022, at age 97. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Ambassadors of the United States to the Holy See Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Frank Shakespeare
